name: Lost to be Found
description:
Upon receiving a mysterious map from your grandfather, you set out for a remote island to find out what secrets the map holds!

Find the "X" on a series of islands that increase in size, number of landmarks, and level of difficulty. But be careful or your shovel may break before you find your prize!

A calm and fun experience that transports you to a happy little island; enjoy your treasure hunt!

Instructions

  • Tab to view the map
  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • L-Shift to run
  • Left mouse click to dig
  • E to open chest
  • R to restart current level
